parameters: Huh? What's with this brat... Got something you want?
This thieving bastard! Return the stolen grimoire!

Tch! So you're a stooge for the grimoire's owner, huh? But
if it's just a brat like you, I can beat you up and then
escape easily!!
Damn... to think I'd lose to a brat like this...!!

You're so weak, LOL! How could you even survive as a thug,
LOL!
Come on, hurry up and return the stolen grimoire.

The grimoire has been taken back to the hideout in the east
by the boss, so it ain't here!

Looks like we have no choice but to go to the hideout to
retrieve the grimoire...
An errand on top of an errand... What a painnnn...
Heh heh! That's what you get for getting cocky, kid!

The grimoire is in the hideout to the east, I'm telling
you!!
You guys... did you really defeat the boss...?

Well, it was a piece of cake. I wanted to experience defeat.
Tada!

You always get carried away so quickly... In reality, it was
quite dangerous.
No, still, to defeat the boss is quite an achievement.

I think I'll take this opportunity to start over from
scratch. As a token of my gratitude, I'll give you this.

Th-This is... the clothes from the store my mother used to
frequent...!!

They're cheap and they have a wide variety of clothes,
right.
Wh-What's with this huge mystery logo emblazoned on it...!!

I wonder if there's any interesting book around... Huh,
what's this?!

Whoa!!! I've discovered an ancient erotic magazine!! This is
so exciting!!
Ugh... What's with this house? It's falling apart.

Has it been a long time since anyone lived here? It's
terribly neglected.
Well, ruins like this are exciting, like a secret base!
